file_content.text: There's no sweeter sight than a tiny nexu cub gleefully feeding on the corpse of its siblings.
Well, did you do it? Did you strike a blow for nexu everywhere?
Oddly easier than striking a blow against nexu....
Tell me how it went.
Your nexu pups are safe.
The cages are gone.
I took care of the scavengers.
Ah! Because of your efforts, future generations can enjoy the magnificent sight of a nexu stalking its prey through the Tarisian swamps....
Probably human prey....
It's done. Now how much was it worth to you?
I expect some cash now.
Here. This should cover any medical expenses you might have incurred.
What about my medical expenses?
Nexu attacks should drop dramatically now that they're no longer defending their cubs. Thank you.
Any chance of changing our plans to focus on saving the rare Tarisian bark beetle?
Just destroy the cages, and maybe they'll leave the nexu alone.
How many teeth did you say those things have? Over three thousand? Because I think I feel every one of them.
Stop complaining; she barely grazed you. Besides, this gave us solid evidence of changes in nexu maternal behavior as a result of--
You! What do you know of the plight of the endangered nexu?
Did some sort of creature attack your friend?
What's a nexu?
Oh, he's just my assistant. But are you seriously saying you've never seen a nexu? One of the most graceful, intelligent, adaptable--
Do I know you?
I am the voice of the voiceless, protector of the nexu, the most beautiful, intelligent, adaptable--
Giant, drooling cat monsters with big pointy spikes....
Sorry. I don't give donations.
Uh-oh. I'm leaving.
As if mere money could end the terrible predations on these beautiful creatures.
Don't be an idiot, Co'overma. These guys don't know what in a Hutt's gut a nexu is. Big, drooling cat monster.
Don't be stupid, Co'overma. Not everyone knows what a blasted nexu is. Big, drooling cat. Monster. Thing.
Liberated zoo specimens started a thriving population here on Taris. But the sows are starting to frenzy because their pups are being stolen. Blasted scavengers!
Are you talking about trying to save the nexu cubs?
You want to help the animals?
Oh, if I could, I'd be kicking down those scavengers' doors and feeding them their own blasters.
Which she can't because one of these lovely nexu shattered every bone in her blaster hand last year--
Are nexu good eating or something?
Why would they go after cubs?
Some unscrupulous piles of dung think it's fun to throw helpless animals into gladiatorial pits so people can laugh while they're cut to pieces.
Most of the time, the nexu win--
I'd go after those scavengers myself, but I, uh, lost all feeling in my blaster hand--
To a nexu love bite.
Of course, if someone else wanted to volunteer....
We are here to restore Taris's environment, not destroy it further.
I'll do it.
Thank you. I knew I wasn't alone in wanting to see a thriving nexu colony.
I think they ate outpost five....
How can it be right to take the lives of sentients in defense of mere beasts?
You believe this is just?
Sentients build cities, destroy planets, wipe out entire species. They don't need anyone to stand up for them.
Except when they're being snacked on by nexu.
These scavengers spend their whole lives tearing helpless babies from their loving mothers--
Nexu mothers eat their young.
If you want to help, you could go to the main scavenger camp and destroy the cages they're using to trap nexu.
Can't say much for nexu, but I'm always up for wiping out scavengers.
I might be able to help.
Perfect. I knew I liked you.
She also likes rancors--it's not a big compliment.
The best thing to do is hit the scavengers' main compound. Destroy all the cages and they can't take another nexu.
You're being a little vague. I don't like it when horribly mauled people are vague with me.
Volunteer for what, exactly?
Go into the scavengers' camp and destroy the cages they're using to trap nexu. What could be simpler?
Not going into the scavengers' camp and destroying the cages they're using to trap nexu?
Um, money? Reward? Something?
I have given all my worldly possessions to the cause of animal rights. But Liefur would be happy to pay you.
I would not!
And I control his accounts while he's convalescing. Just go to the scavengers' camp, to the southeast. Destroy their cages and they won't be able to trap nexu anymore.
Not me. [Refuse quest]
You're crazy. [Refuse quest]
What an incredibly smart thing to say. Why didn't I think of that?
You shut up. We're making a difference here.
Yeah. I eat through a tube now. That's different....
What? You bring him flowers or something?
